bio: 15 years in the Entertainment Industry as a Digital Artist. 13+ on the road. Former NBC, Universal Studios, MGM, Disney and FOX contractor. Current Music, Lifestyle and Travel Photographer. 14 countries. 46 states, 5x. Over 1,000,000 miles traveled.
